trans-unit.source: as_sql() methods can support custom keyword arguments, allowing as_vendorname() methods to override data used to generate the SQL string. Using as_sql() keyword arguments for customization is preferable to mutating self within as_vendorname() methods as the latter can lead to errors when running on different database backends. If your class relies on class attributes to define data, consider allowing overrides in your as_sql() method.
trans-unit.target: as_sql() 方法可以支持自定义关键字参数，从而允许 as_vendorname() 方法覆盖用于生成SQL字符串的数据。使用 as_sql() 关键字参数进行自定义比在 as_vendorname() 方法中对 self 进行突变更可取，因为后者在不同的数据库后端上运行时可能导致错误。如果您的类依赖于类属性来定义数据，请考虑在 as_sql() 方法中允许重写。

trans-unit.source: content is most commonly an iterator, bytestring, memoryview, or string. Other types will be converted to a bytestring by encoding their string representation. Iterators should return strings or bytestrings and those will be joined together to form the content of the response.
trans-unit.target: content 最常见的是迭代器，字节字符串， memoryview 或字符串。其他类型将通过编码其字符串表示形式转换为字节字符串。迭代器应返回字符串或字节串，并将这些字符串或字节串连接在一起以形成响应的内容。

trans-unit.target: content_type 是可以选择由字符集编码完成的MIME类型，用于填充HTTP Content-Type 标头。如果未指定，则默认由 'text/html' 和 DEFAULT_CHARSET 设置组成 text/html; charset=utf-8 ”。

trans-unit.source: content_type is the MIME type provided by the browser – E.g. 'image/jpeg'.
trans-unit.target: content_type 是浏览器提供的MIME类型，例如 'image/jpeg' 。

trans-unit.source: database: Checks database-related configuration issues. Database checks are not run by default because they do more than static code analysis as regular checks do. They are only run by the migrate command or if you specify the database tag when calling the check command.

trans-unit.source: fail_silently: A boolean. When it’s False, send_mail() will raise an smtplib.SMTPException if an error occurs. See the smtplib docs for a list of possible exceptions, all of which are subclasses of SMTPException.
trans-unit.target: fail_silently ：一个布尔值。为 False 时，如果发生错误， send_mail() 将引发 smtplib.SMTPException 。请参阅 smtplib 文档以获取可能的异常列表，所有这些异常都是 SMTPException 的子类。

trans-unit.source: field is the name of the field on the form to check. If field has a value of None, non-field errors (errors you can access via form.non_field_errors()) will be checked.
trans-unit.target: field 是要检查的表单上的字段名称。如果 field 的值为 None ，将检查非字段错误（您可以通过 form.non_field_errors() 访问的错误）。

trans-unit.source: field should be the name of a DateField of your model. kind should be either "year", "month", "week", or "day". Each datetime.date object in the result list is “truncated” to the given type.
trans-unit.target: field 应该是模型的 DateField 的名称。 kind 应该是 "year" ， "month" ， "week" 或 "day" 。结果列表中的每个 datetime.date 对象都被“截断”为给定 type 。

trans-unit.source: field_classes is a dictionary of model field names mapped to a form field class.
trans-unit.target: field_classes 是模型字段名称的字典，映射到表单字段类。

trans-unit.source: field_name can be the name of a field on the model, a field on an abstract or inherited model, or a field defined on another model that points to the model. In the latter case, the field_name will be (in order of preference) the related_query_name set by the user, the related_name set by the user, or the name automatically generated by Django.
trans-unit.target: field_name 可以是模型上的字段，抽象或继承模型上的字段的名称，也可以是指向该模型的另一个模型上定义的字段的名称。在后一种情况下， field_name 将（按优先顺序） related_query_name 由用户，该组 related_name 由用户设置，或由Django的自动生成的名称。

trans-unit.source: field_name is a string name of the file <input> field.
trans-unit.target: field_name 是文件 <input> 字段的字符串名称。

trans-unit.source: field_name should be the name of a DateTimeField of your model.

trans-unit.source: force_str(s, encoding='utf-8', strings_only=False, errors='strict') is identical to smart_str() in almost all cases. The difference is when the first argument is a lazy translation instance. While smart_str() preserves lazy translations, force_str() forces those objects to a string (causing the translation to occur). Normally, you’ll want to use smart_str(). However, force_str() is useful in template tags and filters that absolutely must have a string to work with, not just something that can be converted to a string.
trans-unit.target: force_str(s, encoding='utf-8', strings_only=False, errors='strict') 在几乎所有情况下，force_str（s，encoding ='utf-8'，strings_only = False，errors ='strict'）都与 smart_str() 相同。区别在于，第一个参数是惰性翻译实例。当 smart_str() 保留惰性转换时， force_str() 强制将这些对象转换为字符串（导致转换发生）。通常，您将要使用 smart_str() 。但是， force_str() 在模板标记和过滤器中很有用，这些标记和过滤器绝对必须具有字符串才能使用，而不仅仅是可以转换为字符串的字符串。

trans-unit.source: incr()/decr() methods are not guaranteed to be atomic. On those backends that support atomic increment/decrement (most notably, the memcached backend), increment and decrement operations will be atomic. However, if the backend doesn’t natively provide an increment/decrement operation, it will be implemented using a two-step retrieve/update.

trans-unit.source: prefetch_related in most cases will be implemented using an SQL query that uses the ‘IN’ operator. This means that for a large QuerySet a large ‘IN’ clause could be generated, which, depending on the database, might have performance problems of its own when it comes to parsing or executing the SQL query. Always profile for your use case!
trans-unit.target: prefetch_related 在大多数情况下，prefetch_related将使用使用'IN'运算符的SQL查询来实现。这意味着对于较大的 QuerySet 可能会生成一个较大的'IN'子句，根据数据库的不同，在解析或执行SQL查询时，可能会有其自身的性能问题。始终针对您的用例进行剖析！

trans-unit.source: prefetch_related, on the other hand, does a separate lookup for each relationship, and does the ‘joining’ in Python. This allows it to prefetch many-to-many and many-to-one objects, which cannot be done using select_related, in addition to the foreign key and one-to-one relationships that are supported by select_related. It also supports prefetching of GenericRelation and GenericForeignKey, however, it must be restricted to a homogeneous set of results. For example, prefetching objects referenced by a GenericForeignKey is only supported if the query is restricted to one ContentType.
trans-unit.target: prefetch_related 另一方面，prefetch_related对每个关系进行单独的查找，并在Python中进行“联接”。这使得它可以预取许多一对多和多对一的一个对象，它不能做使用 select_related ，除了外键，并通过所支持的一个一对一的关系 select_related 。它还支持 GenericRelation 和 GenericForeignKey 的预取，但是，必须将其限制为同类结果。例如，通过引用的预取对象 GenericForeignKey 如果查询被限制为一个时，才支持 ContentType 。

trans-unit.source: select_related works by creating an SQL join and including the fields of the related object in the SELECT statement. For this reason, select_related gets the related objects in the same database query. However, to avoid the much larger result set that would result from joining across a ‘many’ relationship, select_related is limited to single-valued relationships - foreign key and one-to-one.
trans-unit.target: select_related 通过创建SQL连接并将相关对象的字段包括在 SELECT 语句中来工作。因此， select_related 将在同一数据库查询中获取相关对象。但是，为避免跨“许多”关系进行 select_related 会产生更大的结果集，select_related仅限于单值关系-外键和一对一关系。

trans-unit.source: select_template() is just like get_template(), except it takes a list of template names. It tries each name in order and returns the first template that exists.
trans-unit.target: select_template() 类似于 get_template() ，只是它需要模板名称列表。它按顺序尝试每个名称，然后返回存在的第一个模板。

trans-unit.source: send() differs from send_robust() in how exceptions raised by receiver functions are handled. send() does not catch any exceptions raised by receivers; it simply allows errors to propagate. Thus not all receivers may be notified of a signal in the face of an error.
trans-unit.target: send() 与 send_robust() （）的不同之处在于如何处理接收器函数引发的异常。 send() 方法并不能捕获由接收器提出的任何异常; 它只是允许错误传播。因此，面对错误，可能不会将信号通知所有接收器。

trans-unit.source: send(fail_silently=False) sends the message. If a connection was specified when the email was constructed, that connection will be used. Otherwise, an instance of the default backend will be instantiated and used. If the keyword argument fail_silently is True, exceptions raised while sending the message will be quashed. An empty list of recipients will not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: send(fail_silently=False) 发送消息。如果在构造电子邮件时指定了连接，则将使用该连接。否则，将实例化并使用默认后端的实例。如果关键字参数 fail_silently 为 True ，将消除发送消息时引发的异常。空的收件人列表不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: send_messages(email_messages) sends a list of EmailMessage objects. If the connection is not open, this call will implicitly open the connection, and close the connection afterwards. If the connection is already open, it will be left open after mail has been sent.
trans-unit.target: send_messages(email_messages) 发送一个 EmailMessage 对象列表。如果未打开连接，则此调用将隐式打开连接，然后再关闭连接。如果连接已经打开，则在发送邮件后它将保持打开状态。

trans-unit.source: send_robust() catches all errors derived from Python’s Exception class, and ensures all receivers are notified of the signal. If an error occurs, the error instance is returned in the tuple pair for the receiver that raised the error.
trans-unit.target: send_robust() 捕获从Python的 Exception 类派生的所有错误，并确保将信号通知所有接收者。如果发生错误，则在引发错误的接收器的元组对中返回错误实例。

trans-unit.source: serialize determines if Django serializes the database into an in-memory JSON string before running tests (used to restore the database state between tests if you don’t have transactions). You can set this to False to speed up creation time if you don’t have any test classes with serialized_rollback=True.
trans-unit.target: serialize 确定Django在运行测试之前是否将数据库序列化为内存中的JSON字符串（用于在没有事务的情况下恢复测试之间的数据库状态）。如果没有任何带有serialized_rollback = True的测试类，则可以将其设置为 False ,以加快创建时间。

trans-unit.source: serialize: If False, the field will not be serialized when the model is passed to Django’s serializers. Defaults to True.
trans-unit.target: serialize ：如果为 False ，则将模型传递给Django的序列化程序时，不会对该字段进行序列化。默认为 True 。

trans-unit.source: smart_bytes(s, encoding='utf-8', strings_only=False, errors='strict') is essentially the opposite of smart_str(). It forces the first argument to a bytestring. The strings_only parameter has the same behavior as for smart_str() and force_str(). This is slightly different semantics from Python’s builtin str() function, but the difference is needed in a few places within Django’s internals.
trans-unit.target: smart_bytes(s, encoding='utf-8', strings_only=False, errors='strict') 本质上与 smart_str() 相反。它将第一个参数强制为字节串。该 strings_only 参数具有相同的行为作为 smart_str() 和 force_str() 。这与Python的内置 str() 函数的语义略有不同，但是在Django内部的一些地方需要这种差异。

trans-unit.source: smart_bytes(s, encoding='utf-8', strings_only=False, errors='strict')[source]
trans-unit.target: smart_bytes(s, encoding='utf-8', strings_only=False, errors='strict') [源代码]

trans-unit.source: smart_str(s, encoding='utf-8', strings_only=False, errors='strict') converts its input to a string. The encoding parameter specifies the input encoding. (For example, Django uses this internally when processing form input data, which might not be UTF-8 encoded.) The strings_only parameter, if set to True, will result in Python numbers, booleans and None not being converted to a string (they keep their original types). The errors parameter takes any of the values that are accepted by Python’s str() function for its error handling.
trans-unit.target: smart_str(s, encoding='utf-8', strings_only=False, errors='strict') 将其输入转换为字符串。该 encoding 参数指定了输入编码。（例如，Django在处理表单输入数据时可能会在内部使用此格式，而输入数据可能未采用UTF-8编码。） strings_only 参数（如果设置为True）将导致Python数字，布尔值和 None 不转换为字符串（它们保持其原始类型）。该 errors 参数接受任何由Python的接受值 str() 为它的错误处理功能。

trans-unit.source: smart_str(s, encoding='utf-8', strings_only=False, errors='strict')[source]
trans-unit.target: smart_str(s, encoding='utf-8', strings_only=False, errors='strict') [源代码]

trans-unit.source: sql_queries – A list of {'sql': ..., 'time': ...} dictionaries, representing every SQL query that has happened so far during the request and how long it took. The list is in order by database alias and then by query. It’s lazily generated on access.
trans-unit.target: sql_queries – {'sql': ..., 'time': ...} 字典的列表，表示到目前为止在请求期间发生的每个SQL查询以及花费的时间。该列表按数据库别名和查询顺序排序。它是在访问时延迟生成的。

trans-unit.source: test_no_questions doesn’t create any questions, but checks the message: “No polls are available.” and verifies the latest_question_list is empty. trans-unit.source: total_form_count returns the total number of forms in this formset. initial_form_count returns the number of forms in the formset that were pre-filled, and is also used to determine how many forms are required. trans-unit.source: tzinfo defines the time zone to which datetimes are converted prior to truncation. Indeed, a given datetime has different representations depending on the time zone in use. This parameter must be a datetime.tzinfo object. If it’s None, Django uses the current time zone. It has no effect when USE_TZ is False.
trans-unit.target: tzinfo 定义截断之前将日期时间转换为的时区。实际上，给定的日期时间根据使用的时区而具有不同的表示形式。此参数必须是 datetime.tzinfo 对象。如果为 None ，则Django使用当前时区。当 USE_TZ 为 False 时，它无效。

trans-unit.source: values() and values_list() are both intended as optimizations for a specific use case: retrieving a subset of data without the overhead of creating a model instance. This metaphor falls apart when dealing with many-to-many and other multivalued relations (such as the one-to-many relation of a reverse foreign key) because the “one row, one object” assumption doesn’t hold.
trans-unit.target: values() 和 values_list() 都旨在作为特定用例的优化：检索数据的子集，而无需创建模型实例。当处理多对多和其他多值关系（例如反向外键的一对多关系）时，这种隐喻会崩溃，因为“单行，一个对象”假设不成立。

trans-unit.source: {% extends variable %} uses the value of variable. If the variable evaluates to a string, Django will use that string as the name of the parent template. If the variable evaluates to a Template object, Django will use that object as the parent template.
trans-unit.target: {% extends variable %} 使用 variable 的值。如果该变量的值为字符串，则Django将使用该字符串作为父模板的名称。如果该变量的值为 Template 对象，则Django将使用该对象作为父模板。

trans-unit.target: {% get_available_languages as LANGUAGES %} 返回一个元组列表，其中第一个元素是语言代码，第二个元素是语言名称（转换为当前活动的语言环境）。

trans-unit.source: {% get_current_language as LANGUAGE_CODE %} returns the current user’s preferred language as a string. Example: en-us. See How Django discovers language preference.
trans-unit.target: {% get_current_language as LANGUAGE_CODE %} 以字符串形式返回当前用户的首选语言。示例： en-us 。请参阅Django如何发现语言偏好。

trans-unit.source: {% get_current_language_bidi as LANGUAGE_BIDI %} returns the current locale’s direction. If True, it’s a right-to-left language, e.g. Hebrew, Arabic. If False it’s a left-to-right language, e.g. English, French, German, etc.
trans-unit.target: {% get_current_language_bidi as LANGUAGE_BIDI %} 返回当前语言环境的方向。如果为 True ，则是从右到左的语言，例如希伯来语，阿拉伯语。如果为 False ,则为从左到右的语言，例如英语，法语，德语等。

trans-unit.source: {% ifequal a b %} ... {% endifequal %} is an obsolete way to write {% if a == b %} ... {% endif %}. Likewise, {% ifnotequal a b %} ... {% endifnotequal %} is superseded by {% if a != b %} ... {% endif %}. The ifequal and ifnotequal tags will be deprecated in a future release.
trans-unit.target: {% ifequal a b %} ... {% endifequal %} 是写 {% if a == b %} ... {% endif %} 一种过时方法。同样， {% ifnotequal a b %} ... {% endifnotequal %} 被 {% if a != b %} ... {% endif %} 取代。该 ifequal 和 ifnotequal 标签将在未来的版本中将会弃用。

trans-unit.source: If you experience performance issues in templates, the first thing to do is to understand exactly why. Using an alternative template system may prove faster, but the same gains may also be available without going to that trouble - for example, expensive processing and logic in your templates could be done more efficiently in your views.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在模板中遇到性能问题，那么要做的第一件事就是确切地了解原因。使用备用模板系统可能会证明更快，但是在不造成麻烦的情况下也可以获得相同的收益-例如，可以在视图中更有效地完成模板中的昂贵处理和逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Laziness is a strategy complementary to caching. Caching avoids recomputation by saving results; laziness delays computation until it’s actually required.
trans-unit.target: 懒惰是对缓存的补充策略。缓存通过保存结果来避免重新计算；懒惰会延迟计算，直到真正需要它为止。

trans-unit.source: Prepare the data for the database. Each field’s get_db_prep_save() method is asked to provide its current value in a data type that can be written to the database.
trans-unit.target: 为数据库准备数据。要求每个字段的 get_db_prep_save() 方法以可写入数据库的数据类型提供其当前值。

trans-unit.source: Preprocess the data. Each field’s pre_save() method is called to perform any automated data modification that’s needed. For example, the date/time fields override pre_save() to implement auto_now_add and auto_now.
trans-unit.target: 预处理数据。调用每个字段的 pre_save() 方法以执行所需的任何自动数据修改。例如，日期/时间字段覆盖 pre_save() 以实现 auto_now_add 和 auto_now 。

trans-unit.source: Safe strings are strings that have been marked safe from further escaping at output time. Any necessary escaping has already been done. They’re commonly used for output that contains raw HTML that is intended to be interpreted as-is on the client side.
trans-unit.target: 安全字符串是已标记为可以在输出时进一步转义的字符串。任何必要的转义操作已经完成。它们通常用于包含原始HTML的输出，这些原始HTML打算在客户端按原样解释。

trans-unit.source: Slicing. As explained in Limiting QuerySets, a QuerySet can be sliced, using Python’s array-slicing syntax. Slicing an unevaluated QuerySet usually returns another unevaluated QuerySet, but Django will execute the database query if you use the “step” parameter of slice syntax, and will return a list. Slicing a QuerySet that has been evaluated also returns a list.
trans-unit.target: 切片。如Limiting QuerySets中所述，可以使用Python的数组切片语法对 QuerySet 进行切片。对未评估的 QuerySet 进行切片通常会返回另一个未评估的 QuerySet ，但是如果您使用slice语法的“ step”参数，则Django将执行数据库查询，并将返回一个列表。切片已评估的 QuerySet 还会返回一个列表。

trans-unit.source: admin.E123: The value of list_editable[n] cannot be in both list_editable and list_display_links.
trans-unit.target: admin.E123： list_editable[n] 值不能同时在 list_editable 和 list_display_links 中。

trans-unit.source: admin.E124: The value of list_editable[n] refers to the first field in list_display (<label>), which cannot be used unless list_display_links is set.
trans-unit.target: admin.E124： list_editable[n] 的值引用 list_display （ <label> ）中的第一个字段，除非设置了 list_display_links ,否则无法使用。
